name: Google News & Finance Dark and Colors -All Nations
description:
Custom style for Google News and Google Finance.
Style uses dark background and modifies colors and fonts (no images).
Hopefully it should work with all country mutations.

UPDATE 12.12.2009:
- Added custom Google logos with black background
- Changed appearance of interactive fields (mozilla styles)
- Some other minor tweaks

UPDATE 7.3.2010
- Just a bugfix update (repaired white borders around stories that have appeared after "starred" addon by Google).

UPDATE 8.3.2010
- Added styles for FastFlip feature
